plot: An escaped lunatic kills a woman, strangles a railway passenger, climbs a building, and is caught by a sailor.
title: The Fatal Hand
plot_es: An escaped lunatic kills a woman, strangles a railway passenger, climbs a building, and is caught by a sailor.
plot_en: An escaped lunatic kills a woman, strangles a railway passenger, climbs a building, and is caught by a sailor.
